title: N172 Old Judge 25 singles for sale
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge 25 singles for sale
posts.post_content:
I purchased a group of N172 Old Judge cards...the lot being described as a beater lot with some nicer ones included. I have done my best to figure out what cards definately have trimming or other defects but am not an expert. Therefore, any item purchased may be returned for a full refund no questions asked if the buyer is not happy with the condition of the card upon arrival. I am going to send these for grading, but will throw them out there raw to Net54 first...

Arundel Indianapolis
Bat in right hand at side
Card has backing issues and a front stain
$85

Baldwin Chicago
Bat at ready heels together
Crease and chip out of right side
$85

Brown Pittsburg
Catch, Hands cupped chest high, Centre Field
Chipping at top edge...overall VG
$140

Burch St Louis
Dark uniform leaning left tagging base
Trimmed to no borders all 4 sides, rebacked
$75

Burns Kansas Citys
Catch hands shoulder high
Rounded corners and two creases
$90

Trimmed at bottom and stain at right front
$90

$90

Trimmed at bottom, otherwise nice
$110

$90

$75

$110

$90

$90

$100

$125

$200

$200

$90

$80

$140

Tom C

Tom C
